Title: French Fried Vacation
Writer: L' Equipe du Splendid (scenario), L' Equipe du Splendid (adaptation), Patrice Leconte (adaptation), Josiane Balasko, Christian Clavier, Michel Blanc, Marie-Anne Chazel, Gérard Jugnot, Dominique Lavanant, Thierry Lhermitte, Bruno Moynot
Actors: Josiane Balasko, Luis Rego, Marie-Anne Chazel, Michel Blanc
Plot: Holidaymakers arriving in a Club Med camp on the Ivory Coast are determined to forget their everyday problems and emotional disappointments. Games, competitions, outings, bathing and sunburn accompany a continual succession of casual affairs.
